name: RealEdge Ltd
description:
We have nearly 20 years of experience in delivering effective digital, design, marketing and communication solutions for clients from our home on the outskirts of Nottingham. Even though we're based in a former 1920’s school building, our methods are far from old school. Our creative ideas and logical approach to marketing makes commercial sense, and, with our unique combination of skills and knowledge, we create genuine integrated marketing solutions that work.
Think of RealEdge as an extension of your marketing team - keeping business personal and the results deliverable. If you’re a company with a message to tell, a product to sell, or a brand to develop, let’s talk soon about adding a RealEdge to your marketing.
READ MORE...
